metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0436 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high.
metadata.Description:
Path Traversal in GitHub repository gruntjs/grunt prior to 1.5.2.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-0436` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

grunt - 1.0.1-8ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: grunt package in esm-apps/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-8ubuntu0.1+esm1').
